post.author: David_020
post.body:
Anyone know if this is possible? Tried the link off the id store to test for it and got EA's page with only 5 recent games (i.e. Spore).

BTW, Happy B-day DooM!

post.author: BNA!
post.body: I may be mistaken, but I don't think it's available "yet". Many people currently consider how and what to port, but the processing power is definetly there.

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: This became a headline news topic?

post.author: labriola
post.body:
How much does an iPhone 3G cost per month with unlimited data and text messaging on a family plan? I'm currently on a family plan. I'm interested in the iPhone 3G now because Apple introduced the iPhone 3GS and the original iPhone 3G is only $99 now. How much does it cost per month with unlimited data and text messaging? I'm on a family plan. Oh! and I'm currently not eligable for an upgrade, but can I just sign up for another 2 years and get the iPhone 3G for the $99?
__________________
